solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int maxArea(int[] height) {--newline--        int left = 0, right = height.length - 1;--newline--        int maxArea = 0;--newline--    --newline--        while (left < right) {--newline--            maxArea = Math.max(maxArea, Math.min(height[left], height[right])--newline--                    * (right - left));--newline--            if (height[left] < height[right])--newline--                left++;--newline--            else--newline--                right--;--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--        return maxArea;--newline--    }--newline--}
